history.proof: intros. unfold wexpansion. unfold wexpansion in H, H0. hauto use: wexpansion1_comp, simulation_eeq, simulation_comp, inv_comp unfold: eeq.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type X, Y, Z : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y TZ : reduction_t A Z R : relation2 X Y S : relation2 Y Z H : wexpansion1 TX TY R /\\ simulation TY TX (trans R) H0 : wexpansion1 TY TZ S /\\ simulation TZ TY (trans S) a : Lbl A x : ?M1513 x' : ?M1513 y : ?M1515 y0 : ?M1516 a x x' c : comp ?M1519 ?M1520 x y Unable to unify "exists2 y' : ?M1515, EWeak ?M1518 a y y' & comp ?M1519 ?M1520 x' y'" with "exists2 y' : Z, REWeak TZ a y y' & (fun (x : X) (z : Z) => exists2 y : Y, R x y & S y z) x' y'".

original: intros. unfold wexpansion. intros. unfold wexpansion in H, H0. unfold comp. split. - apply expansion1_comp; auto. - apply simulation_comp; auto.
